title: The Monkey's paw
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Martha Moran
brief_description: Be careful what you wish for in this classic horror tale about a magical monkey’s paw and its power of granting three wishes to whoever possesses it. Adapted from the story by W.W. Jacobs. Cast includes Evelyn Goffman, Herb Graham, Robb W. King, Ted Gold, Byron Clarke.
